Trade/Device Name(s): Prodigy Preferred Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Prodigy® Preferred Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Prodigy Preferred Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a meter and test strip system for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites; for self-testing by a single user with diabetes at home, as an aid to monitor diabetes control, not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
